custom_title_detail:
You can customize <title> tag.
{{sitename}} will be automatically replaced with the app name, and {{page}} will be replaced with the page name/path.
custom_header_detail:
You can customize HTML header that applies all pages. Your custom script will be inserted in <header> but above other <script> tags.
Relaod page to see changes.
write_css: You can write CSS that is applied to whole system.
write_java: You can write Javascript that is applied to whole system.
reflect_change: You need to reload the page to reflect the change.
